channel.title: BUbreakingHeadlines
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from BUbreakingHeadlines, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Thai teen says he threw himself out of a window to escape Cambodia’s brutal scam farms

RFK Jr. appoints longtime anti-vaccine ally Lyn Redwood to HHS position
item.description: Health Secretary Robert F. Kennedy Jr. has hired an anti-vaccine advocate and longtime ally to a position at the Health and Human Services Department.

item.title: Intel leaders say Iran nuclear sites "severely damaged," disputing preliminary U.S. assessment
item.description: Director of National Intelligence Tulsi Gabbard and CIA Director John Ratcliffe claimed their agencies had new intelligence regarding the U.S. strikes...

item.title: State Dept. layoffs could start as soon as Friday, as high court decision looms
item.description: The State Department could begin laying off hundreds of Washington, D.C.-based staff, according to internal correspondence.

item.title: How Sean ‘Diddy’ Combs’ sex trafficking trial has played out

item.description: The Supreme Court rejected Planned Parenthood's challenge to South Carolina's attempt to bar the organization from participating in its Medicaid progr...

item.title: Double-decker bus carrying students plunges into English river
item.description: A double-decker bus carrying high school students has plunged into a river in England

item.title: Israel-Iran live updates: Hegseth defends Iran bombing, criticizes media
item.description: Hegseth said the bombing of Iran is the most "complex and secretive military operation in history."

item.title: Man accused of kicking airport K9 so hard "he was lifted off of the ground"
item.description: The dog, a beagle named Freddy, had alerted an agent to the traveler's bag in the luggage area, according to an affidavit.

item.title: Sean 'Diddy' Combs trial updates: Prosecution closing arguments underway
item.description: Sean "Diddy" Combs is charged with sex trafficking and racketeering conspiracy. He has pleaded not guilty.

item.title: How much would a $200,000 annuity pay monthly if bought at age 65?
item.description: Planning for retirement? Here's how much a $200,000 annuity could pay you monthly — and what impacts the payout.

item.title: Trump admin live updates: Pentagon provides more details of US strikes against Iran
item.description: Trump, speaking at a news conference at the NATO summit in the Netherlands, celebrated allies boosting defense spending.
